name: Bodyverse
description:
A top down shooter strategy, where you fight alongside your fellow cells.

The game incorporates use of top down movement to make the white cells follow the player which turns out to the player being able to eliminate all the Viruses from the body. The game makes simple use of shooting and movement to make sure the player has enough challenge and balance the gameplay to make it even more fun!. Have fun killing all the big ugly viruses in this cute Top Down strategy simulator

In first stage of the game make sure you find the virus, touch it and go back to the start, you will then enter the stage 2 of the immune response.

Credits: https://ewhtp4.itch.io/ and https://itch.io/profile/daemon013
